entities.Entity
entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Player
extends Entity
This class represents the user controlled player on the screen
Author:
Christopher Lew

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs this Player at position x,y with the given image and user provided dimensions
      Parameters:
      img - the PImage that is drawn for this Creature
      x - the top left x coordinate
      y - the top left x coordinate
      width - the width of this Creature
      height - the height of this Creature

    • Player

      public Player​(processing.core.PImage img, int x, int y, int width, int height, processing.core.PImage flipped)
      Constructs this Player at position x,y with the given image and user provided dimensions
      Parameters:
      img - the PImage that is drawn for this Creature
      x - the top left x coordinate
      y - the top left x coordinate
      width - the width of this Creature
      height - the height of this Creature
      flipped - the flipped image of the provided image

      reduces the health of the player
      Parameters:
      damage - How much damage to take (int)
      otherX - x coordinate of the other Creature

      otherWidth - width of the other Creature
      otherHeight - height of the other Creature

      otherWidth - width of the other Creature
      otherHeight - height of the other Creature
